results.body:
Britney Spears and boyfriend David Lucado looked very happy while laughing and holding hands as they left the mall in Thousand Oaks in 2013.X17online.com

Britney Spears called it quits on her boyfriend of 18-months, David Lucado, after a video of him cheating on her is reportedly being shopped around Hollywood.

The pop singer took to Twitter to let fans know she's doing okay.

ADVERTISEMENT

ADVERTISEMENT

Ahhhh the single life!

-- Britney Spears (@britneyspears) August 28, 2014

TMZ reports the video shows Lucado making out with a women while dancing in what appears to be someone's living room. The video is said to be shot in early August.

PHOTOS: Britney Spears through the years

"David is very, very in love with Britney. This is unfortunate and he hopes that it all works out," a rep for Lucado told TMZ.

Spears first stepped out with Lucado in March 2013 after calling off her engagement to Jason Trawick. The mom of sons Sean, 8, and Jayden, 7, with ex-husband Kevin Federline, was also previously married to childhood friend Jason Alexander for 55-hours.

+ FollowFOX411 on Facebook
results.title: Britney's back on the market

results.body:
She's back on the market!

Britney Spears tweeted that she is single again.

"Ahhhh the single life!" the "Piece of Me" singer wrote Thursday

READ: The Surprisingly Normal Way Britney Spears Met Her New Boyfriend

Spears, 32, had been dating lawyer David Lucado since early last year, but rumors swirled this week that the two had split.

After her "single" post, she also posted an Instagram video about "having a s****y day..."

It's unclear whether that was related to the split.

Spears, who has been married twice, gushed about Lucado in December.

"I just love, he's very passionate, he's funny and he's sexy," she told DeGeneres last year. "I love him."

Ahhhh the single life! -- Britney Spears (@britneyspears)
results.title: Britney Spears Is Single Again

results.body:
Why does Britney Spears need to be with any man right now?

She has gone from one lesser man to the next, and each relationship has ended with public dissection of why that guy was not right for her or why he was a parasite. Spears is still young and beautiful, and she has two little boys to raise and a ton of dough to help do it.

Maybe she should just fall deeply in love with herself and focus solely on her and the kids, ignoring the need to couple up for awhile. It might serve her very well. It would be great for her sons.

The news is that she has split with her boyfriend David Lucado, who was stupid enough to have some video surface of him being indiscreet with another woman. He was trash from the get-go.

Britney announced the news herself on Twitter, writing, "Ahhhh the single life!"

A rep for Spears also confirmed the split to "Entertainment Tonight."

The 32-year-old singer and mother of two, who is in the middle of a performance residency in Las Vegas, reportedly pulled the plug on the relationship after video surfaced of Lucado cheating on her.

"She is heartbroken. She is in Vegas. But she will get through it. She's a strong girl and he was never right for her," a source told E! News.

Spears and Lucado started dating last year, shortly after she ended her engagement to Jason Trawick.

Which brings us to this, when you really value yourself and put stock in your self-esteem and stop "looking" for love, it finds you eventually. The right match, someone truly worthy of you will be drawn to that inner confidence you radiate. Britney can do all sorts of things with the fortune she has built, including educate herself or do the Jessica Simpson-Cindy Crawford business mogul route.

We're Team Britney; stay single girl! Keep a firm hand on those kids and focus on yourself.
results.title: Britney Spears Should Go Steady With Herself For Awhile

results.body:
Britney Spears just had to break up with yet another boyfriend because he cheated on her, and honestly -- when is this girl gonna catch a break? It isn't even like she has a long history of guys cheating on her, just a long history of dating guys who don't necessarily have her best interests at stake. Cripes.

This gem was named David Lucado, and he and Britney had dated for about a year and a half after being introduced by mutual friends in February 2013. Which, coincidentally, was about a month after she ended her engagement to Jason Trawick, whom she'd dated since 2009, right after she broke up with Adnan Ghalib, who was THE WORST. And before him, there was a series of flings with a string of different guys that stretches all the way back to Justin Timberlake. Basically what I'm saying is she hasn't been single since like...birth. So maybe it's time to take a little breather from guys.

Especially since this one was such a little shyster! According to TMZ, there was video being shopped around of David:

"...making out with a woman and dancing with her. It looks like they're in someone's living room. We're told the video was shot in early August."

First of all, come on man, seriously? You must have just wanted to get caught, if you were letting yourself be videotaped making out and dancing with a girl in someone's living room. Pull it together. The news got to Britney when TMZ called her father Jamie Spears for comment, and he said he'd issue a statement, but he had to talk to Britney first. And apparently as soon as he did, she broke up with David, because she tweeted immediately afterward:

Ahhhh the single life!

-- Britney Spears (@britneyspears) August 28, 2014

Get it girl. That totally sucks, but that's the only way to do it. And according to HollywoodLife, even though she's heartbroken, she's not going to let it affect her show.

"The only thing that would cancel any show date would be illness and Britney is in great health and she will completely fulfill her residency. She is not going to allow personal matters to take over business matters. The show will not be changed."

Good for her. Glad she only wasted a year and a half on this guy...but if I could offer a piece of advice, it would be to stay single for more than a month. Maybe even more than a year! Because the only thing worse than wasting eighteen months on a shitty relationship is wasting thirty-two years on a bunch of shitty relationships. Just saying.
results.title: Britney Spears Got Cheated On By Her Boyfriend — Girl Can't Catch A Break

results.body:
Last week, the "Work Bitch" superstar revealed (quite candidly) that she is now single on Twitter ("Ahhh the single life!"), which led to a string of TMZ stories (and a hilarious Instagram) detailing the break-up: Reportedly, ex David Lucado cheated on B, and there's a tape involved. Or something like that. Regardless, Miss Britney Spears just ain't got time for that foolishness and f-kery -- and she's speaking out about it.

During Sunday night's show of Piece Of Me residency, Britney decided to speak up about the situation in an incredible mini-rant to her adoring fans: "The best thing about your boyfriend cheating on you...is that you get to go on another first date. Oh em gee, a first date! Woooooo!" she exclaimed. Something more personal, indeed!

Look: We'd never want to see anyone break B's heart, but this newfound sense of Independentney has got us seriously shaking and crying with joy. That classic Brit Brit personality is back! Besides, she's Britney Spears -- there'll always be better, more loyal boys knocking on her door asking for a first date.

source.title: Music News, Reviews, and Gossip on Idolator.com

results.title: Britney Spears Calls Out Her Cheating Ex Live On Stage In Las Vegas: Watch

results.body:
Britney Spears' BF caught cheating on camera!

Britney Spears and David Lucado have called it quits after 18 months of dating and numerous bloggers and media outlets have suggested it's because there's footage floating around that shows Lucado making out with a woman who's definitely not Brit Brit. We feel for you, Britney! <3

Spears' publicist confirmed the news and she herself took to Twitter to announce the split.

She then posted this video to InstaG, which makes us think she's not all that broken-hearted.

Joan Rivers stops breathing during surgery

The 81-year-old comedian was reportedly undergoing surgery on her vocal chords in a NYC clinic when she stopped breathing and had to be rushed to a nearby hospital. According to TMZ, Joan's heart stopped beating momentarily and she was in critical condition, however, doctors were able to save her and she's now "resting comfortably." Get well soon, Joan!

Hilary Swank plays pianist with ALS in new movie

Based on George C. Wolfe's novel of the same name, You're Not You stars Hilary Swank as a classical pianist diagnosed with ALS who hires Emmy Rossum, a wannabe rock singer, as her assistant. The movie also has Josh Duhamel, Marcia Gay Harden and Jason Ritter, although all eyes are sure to be on Swank who might just take home her third Oscar with this role. You can view the flick's first trailer below, courtesy of Entertainment Weekly!
results.title: Britney Spears, Joan Rivers and Hilary Swank land in our MORNING QUICKIES

results.body:
Like many Britney Spears fans, whenever she goes through a break-up or endures any bump in her personal or professional life, we brace ourselves a little. We all know what happened in 2007 after she split up from Kevin Federline, after all.

And now it appears that she has parted ways with David Lucado - a man her father ran an actual background check on - after he cheated on her. Boo hiss boo, Lucado. Boo hiss boo. But actually, while there must undoubtedly be a lot of hurt and heartbreak going on behind the scenes, Brit's outward persona on the likes of Twitter and Instagram has never been livelier.

While she is often accused of hiding behind the same well-oiled management machine that helped her back to the top of the charts following her well-documented 'dark years', she's been stepping into her own light with funny videos, colloquial tweets and - as reported earlier today - even telling the crowd at one of her Las Vegas shows that she's excited to start dating again. We can't even remember the last time she was that open without looking utterly terrified.

Is it a co-incidence that the influx of, well, 'personality' has seemingly been kicked up a notch since the unfortunate leak of her unedited singing earlier in the summer? Maybe, maybe not - but who cares... Britney's got banter, and we're loving it.

3. That time she chucked casual shade at David LucadNO

Ahhhh the single life! -- Britney Spears (@britneyspears)

August 28, 2014

4. That time she was actually happy about being single again
results.title: Britney Spears May Be Heartbroken But Her Social Media Game Is Flawless

results.body:
Hopefully, you understood that was a terrible attempt to use Britney's own lyrics to describe her current lot in life. Listen, it's Friday before a long weekend. Our puns and allusions may not be entirely on-point. What we're trying to convey is that A) Britney Spears broke up with David Lucado, her boyfriend of a little over one year; and B) she's totally cool with it.

In fact, Spears tweeted "Ahhhh the single life!" This breakup clearly isn't slowing her down. Nor is she letting rumors of Lucado's supposed infidelity get to her. If only she could have made all of our dreams come true by tweeting, "My loneliness isn't killing me. I must confess: I still believe." There's still time, Brit. Do it for your fans. (People)

More entertainment buzz:

26 Movie Takedowns That Hurt So Good

The 10 Best Celebrity Wedding Guests

The 30 Films You Need To See This Fall
results.title: Britney Spears' Loneliness Isn't Killing Her

results.body:
La cantante Britney Spears anunció, vía Twitter, que está sola y sin compromiso después de que salió a luz un vídeo en el cual su ahora exnovio David Lucado aparece bailando y besándose con otra mujer, informó el portal TMZ.

Ese medio, especializado en chismes de la farándula, informó hoy que el padre de Britney, Jamie Spears, fue el que se encargó de destapar la supuesta infidelidad del novio de su hija.

Jaime Spears "pagó una cantidad sustancial de dinero" a una agencia que vendía el vídeo para adquirirlo, dice TMZ.

"Nos cuentan que Jamie, quien ha sido responsable por los asuntos financieros de Britney durante más de seis años, luego llamó a la cantante y le dijo que tenía algo para mostrarle y que era importante", agregó el medio.

"Cuando Brit vio las pruebas eso fue todo lo que necesitó, y de inmediato declaró terminada la relación" con Lucado.

Nadie sabe, sin embargo, quién grabó el vídeo y si tiene otras copias, pero Jamie Spears dijo a TMZ que si alguien lo difunde o lo publica será demandado por violación de los derechos de propiedad intelectual.

Por su parte, un representante de Lucado dijo a TMZ que "David está muy enamorado de Britney. Esto es desafortunado y él espera que todo se resuelva".

Aparentemente la resolución, después de una relación de dieciocho meses, llegó rápido: "¡Ah, la vida sin compromiso!" tuiteó Britney anoche.
results.title: Britney Spears rompe con su novio David Lucado debido a un vídeo

results.body:
La 'Princesa del pop' termina con su novio después de que salió a luz un video donde aparece bailando y besándose con otra mujer

WASHINGTON, 29 de agosto.- La cantante Britney Spears anunció, vía Twitter, que está sola y sin compromiso después de que salió a luz un video en el cual su ahora ex novio David Lucado aparece bailando y besándose con otra mujer, informó el portal TMZ.

Ese medio, especializado en chismes de la farándula, informó hoy que el padre de Britney, Jamie Spears, fue el que se encargó de destapar la supuesta infidelidad del novio de su hija.

Jaime Spears "pagó una cantidad sustancial de dinero" a una agencia que vendía el video para adquirirlo, dice TMZ.

Nos cuentan que Jamie, quien ha sido responsable por los asuntos financieros de Britney durante más de seis años, luego llamó a la cantante y le dijo que tenía algo para mostrarle y que era importante", agregó el medio.

"Cuando Brit vio las pruebas eso fue todo lo que necesitó, y de inmediato declaró terminada la relación con Lucado".

Nadie sabe, sin embargo, quién grabó el video y si tiene otras copias, pero Jamie Spears dijo a TMZ que si alguien lo difunde o lo publica será demandado por violación de los derechos de propiedad intelectual.

Por su parte, un representante de Lucado dijo a TMZ que "David está muy enamorado de Britney. Esto es desafortunado y él espera que todo se resuelva".

Aparentemente la resolución, después de una relación de dieciocho meses, llegó rápido: "¡Ah, la vida sin compromiso!" tuiteó Britney anoche.
